11  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.eclipse.xml;
12  
13  import java.nio.file.Path;
14  import java.nio.file.Paths;
15  import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
16  
17  import javax.swing.text.Document;
18  
19  import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
20  import org.netbeans.api.annotations.common.CheckForNull;
21  import org.netbeans.api.project.FileOwnerQuery;
22  import org.netbeans.api.project.Project;
23  import org.netbeans.modules.editor.NbEditorUtilities;
24  import org.openide.filesystems.FileObject;
25  
26  /**
27   *
28   * @author bahlef
29   */
30  public class EclipseFormatterUtils {
31  	/** EPF file extension */
32  	private static final String EPF_FILE_EXTENSION = ".epf";
33  
34  	/** XML file extension */
35  	private static final String XML_FILE_EXTENSION = ".xml";
36  
37  	/**
38  	 * Returns the Eclipse formatter file for the given {@link Document} from the given {@link Preferences}.
39  	 * If the value behind {@code useProjectPrefsKey} is {@code true} in the given {@link Preferences}, it
40  	 * will be automatically checked if there is a project specific formatter configuration file available.
41  	 *
42  	 * @param preferences           the {@link Preferences} where to load from
43  	 * @param document              the {@link Document}
44  	 * @param configFileLocationKey the preferences key for the configuration file location
45  	 * @param useProjectPrefsKey    the preferences key whether to use project preferences
46  	 * @param projectPrefFile       the expected Eclipse project specific formatter configuration file name
47  	 *
48  	 * @return the Eclipse formatter file for the given {@link Document} from the given {@link Preferences}.
49  	 *         If the value behind {@code useProjectPrefsKey} is {@code true} in the given {@link Preferences},
50  	 *         it will be automatically checked if there is a project specific formatter configuration file
51  	 *         available.
52  	 */
53  	public static String getEclipseFormatterFile(Preferences preferences, Document document, String configFileLocationKey, String useProjectPrefsKey, String projectPrefFile) {
54  		String formatterFilePref = null;
55  		if (preferences.getBoolean(useProjectPrefsKey, true)) {
56  			//use ${projectdir}/.settings/projectPrefFile, if activated in options
57  			formatterFilePref = getFormatterFileFromProjectConfiguration(document, ".settings/" + projectPrefFile);
58  		}
59  
60  		if (StringUtils.isBlank(formatterFilePref)) {
61  			formatterFilePref = preferences.get(configFileLocationKey, null);
62  			if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(formatterFilePref)) {
63  				Path formatterFilePath = Paths.get(formatterFilePref);
64  				if (!formatterFilePath.isAbsolute()) {
65  					formatterFilePref = getFormatterFileFromProjectConfiguration(document, formatterFilePref);
66  				}
67  			}
68  		}
69  
70  		return formatterFilePref;
71  	}
72  
73  	/**
74  	 * Checks for a project specific Eclipse formatter configuration for the given {@link Document} and returns
75  	 * the file location if found, otherwise {@code null}.
76  	 *
77  	 * @param document         the {@link Document}
78  	 * @param relativeFileName the relative configuration file name
79  	 *
80  	 * @return project specific Eclipse formatter configuration for the given {@link Document} if existent,
81  	 *         otherwise {@code null}
82  	 */
83  	@CheckForNull
84  	private static String getFormatterFileFromProjectConfiguration(Document document, String relativeFileName) {
85  		FileObject fileForDocument = NbEditorUtilities.getFileObject(document);
86  		if (null != fileForDocument) {
87  			Project project = FileOwnerQuery.getOwner(fileForDocument);
88  			if (null != project) {
89  				FileObject projectDirectory = project.getProjectDirectory();
90  				FileObject preferenceFile = projectDirectory.getFileObject(StringUtils.replace(relativeFileName, "\\", "/"));
91  				if (null != preferenceFile) {
92  					return preferenceFile.getPath();
93  				}
94  			}
95  		}
96  
97  		return null;
98  	}
99  
100 	/**
101 	 * Returns {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with the workspace mechanic file extension epf.
102 	 *
103 	 * @param filename the filename to check
104 	 *
105 	 * @return {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with the workspace mechanic file extension epf,
106 	 *         otherwise {@code false}
107 	 */
108 	public static boolean isWorkspaceMechanicFile(String filename) {
109 		return filename != null && filename.endsWith(EPF_FILE_EXTENSION);
110 	}
111 
112 	/**
113 	 * Returns {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with the XML file extension.
114 	 *
115 	 * @param filename the filename to check
116 	 *
117 	 * @return {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with the XML file extension, otherwise
118 	 *         {@code false}
119 	 */
120 	public static boolean isXMLConfigurationFile(String filename) {
121 		return filename != null && filename.endsWith(XML_FILE_EXTENSION);
122 	}
123 
124 	/**
125 	 * Returns {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with the given {@code projectPrefFile}.
126 	 *
127 	 * @param filename        the filename to check
128 	 * @param projectPrefFile the expected Eclipse project specific formatter configuration file name
129 	 *
130 	 * @return {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with {@code org.eclipse.jdt.core.prefs},
131 	 *         otherwise {@code false}
132 	 */
133 	public static boolean isProjectSetting(String filename, String projectPrefFile) {
134 		return filename != null && StringUtils.isNotBlank(projectPrefFile) && filename.endsWith(projectPrefFile);
135 	}
136 }
